title: To whoever spoke to mods on my behalf when I was told to "shove my comments up my ass"
body:
Although I was informed only of your support and not of your name, I appreciate your putting the effort into a losing battle. And lose it we shall; Boards is being inexorably directed into a racist, sexist cesspit where favoritism and cliques trump the rules. Exhortations of reason, fairness, and civility fall on deaf ears, rebuffed with empty promises of discussion behind closed doors.

The important part is that some people care - not only about their own treatment, but about fair treatment for all. The circumstances are distasteful, but sometimes that's what it takes for true character to shine through.

Thank you, anonymous person. Thank you.
